Title: Allows delivery of an application for an absentee ballot to the board of elections through and on the day of the election
Summary: Allows delivery of an application for an absentee ballot to the board of elections through and on the day of the election.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to allowing delivery of an application for an absentee ballot to the board of elections through and on the day of the election
